page.title: 06Evening activities
page.content:
{Bingo During the winter a small prize bingo session is held at the school in aid of the school fund. Run by some of the parents on a monthly basis it attracts an average of 20 people an evening.
{W.E.A. classes Until recently classes were held in the evening in the Pratten Hut, which is part of the school. Normally run in 10-week courses at a small charge they covered a wide variety of subjects, including:History, Wine Tasting and Comparative Religions.
{Keep Fit Another event held in the Pratten Hut is the weekly, evening Keep Fit class. Run by a trained instructor this attracts women of all ages and sizes.
